dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S659 IS: To reauthorize the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Wyden introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991, and for other purposes.

section.header: Extension of Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991

subsection.text: Section 104(c) of the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991 (43 U.S.C. 2214(c)) is amended by striking 2012 and inserting 2018.
Section 301 of the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991 (43 U.S.C. 2241) is amendedâ€”
